Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class ImageBall

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.Ball
project.chenlin_17.Views.ImageBall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
class ImageBall extends Ball
This class contains the model for the image ball and extends the ball class.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN
Note
It is a newly added model.

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageBall

      public ImageBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor initializes the ball view.
      It sets the basic value for the ball setting variable by calling its parent class.
      Parameters:
      center - ball's start position
      image - player set ball image
      group - ball's belonging world setting group

  • Method Details

    • makeImageBall

      private void makeImageBall(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      This function helps adds the ball's image on the page.
      The ball's image position is closely combined with the ball center position's movement by calculation.
      Parameters:
      image - ball's image

    • makeBall

      protected javafx.scene.shape.Shape makeBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB)
      This function implements the method defined in the parent class.
      It helps initializes the ball image view's position property and make tha ellipse ball face as well.
      Specified by:
      makeBall in class Ball
      Parameters:
      center - ball's start position
      radiusA - ball's x radius
      radiusB - ball's y radius
      Returns:
      the built ball with center and specified radius
      Note
      Double conversion is not needed in the javaFX API

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(javafx.geometry.Point2D p)
      This function implements the method defined in the super class.
      It helps update and adjust the ball image's view by updating the property that stands for the image position.
      Specified by:
      moveTo in interface Movable
      Overrides:
      moveTo in class Ball
      Parameters:
      p - designed position

    • updateProperty

      private void updateProperty(javafx.geometry.Point2D newCenter)
      This is a helper function that sets the new image position property by getting the new center.
      Parameters:
      newCenter - ball's new center
